description:
A dying Consul`s last wish is for a private bath. While scouting the location, he is transported to modern Japan once more, and discovers more wonders.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Roman Who Leapt Through Time / Swan Lake
Toki o Kakeru Romajin / Hakuchou no Mizuumi
時をかけるローマ人 / 白鳥の湖
